meta.source: Anthem Blue Cross BlueShield Provider Directory PDF export
meta.search: Optometry search (UCSHIP PPO) within 20 miles of 93106
notes: UC SHIP vision page states you don’t need a referral for vision care; use an in-network Anthem Blue View Vision provider.
Blue View Vision Insight is for routine eye care; medical treatment for eyes is handled under medical benefits and may require an SHS referral within 50 miles.
